## AUDIT-10 vs DUDIT

Conducting research in the fields of psychology and social sciences often involve a complex process of questionnaire harmonisation. This process, which involves comparing and matching items in different questionnaires, can be particularly challenging when dealing with assessment instruments like AUDIT-10 (Alcohol use disorders identification test) and DUDIT, which measure alcohol and drug use disorders, respectively. To minimize the subjectivity and time consumption associated with questionnaire harmonisation, researchers can benefit from using Harmony, an AI-based tool specifically designed for this purpose.

## Compare the items in AUDIT-10 and DUDIT

* <a href="https://harmonydata.ac.uk/app/#_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gZG8geW91IGhhdmUgc2l4IG9yIG1vcmUgdW5pdHMgb2YgYWxjb2hvbCBvbiBvbmUgb2NjYXNpb24____In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIb3cgb2Z0ZW4gb3ZlciB0aGUgcGFzdCB5ZWFyIGhhdmUgeW91IGhhZCBndWlsdCBmZWVsaW5ncyBvciBhIGJhZCBjb25zY2llbmNlIGJlY2F1c2UgeW91IHVzZWQgZHJ1Z3M_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXZlIHlvdSBvciBhbnlvbmUgZWxzZSBiZWVuIGh1cnQgKG1lbnRhbGx5IG9yIHBoeXNpY2FsbHkpIGJlY2F1c2UgeW91IHVzZWQgZHJ1Z3M_In0sIHsicXVlc3Rpb25fdGV4dCI6ICJIYXMgYSByZWxhdGl2ZSBvciBhIGZyaWVuZCwgYSBkb2N0b3Igb3IgYSBudXJzZSwgb3IgYW55b25lIGVsc2UsIGJlZW4gd29ycmllZCBhYm91dCB5b3VyIGRydWcgdXNlIG9yIHNhaWQgdG8geW91IHRoYXQgeW91IHNob3VsZCBzdG9wIHVzaW5nIGRydWdzPyJ9XX1d" target="harmonyapp">Import just DUDIT into Harmony</a> - compare DUDIT with other instruments



By using Harmony in the comparison of AUDIT-10 vs DUDIT, researchers can leverage the software's natural language processing and generative AI models. Harmony provides a percentage match between each item in the two assessments, which can be extremely helpful in the harmonisation process, particularly when the instruments are in different languages. Moreover, the tool offers a database of instruments for selection, or researchers can upload their own questionnaires in PDF format via Harmony's user-friendly web interface. With its ability to automate and streamline the harmonisation process, Harmony equips researchers with an indispensable tool in the analysis of [cohort](/item-harmonisation/harmony-a-free-ai-tool-for-cross-cohort-research/) and [longitudinal studies](/item-harmonisation/harmony-a-free-ai-tool-for-longitudinal-study/), especially those involving AUDIT-10 vs DUDIT.
